name: Life is Short (SK Studios)
description:
Fast paced endless first person shooter!

Controls:

WASD to move

LMB to shoot

Scroll/F to switch weapons

R to reload current weapon

E to interact (pick up weapons/ammo/health packs)

Q to switch vision state (below)

Esc/P to pause

Vision Mechanic:  The game revolves around the idea that you (the player) have 2 vision states. In one state you can see/shoot enemies, and in the other state you can see/pick up ammo, weapons and health packs. The catch is that enemies can still damage you when you can't see them!

I challenged myself to make and release a game in 4 weeks, and this is the end product of my work. It's a sci-fi endless FPS game developed solo by me (apart from the shotgun model which one of my friends made for me).

If you want to see my development journey, go check out my YouTube channel (https://bit.ly/sk-studios). If the video hits 50 likes I will keep developing the game further, so make sure to smash like and subscribe while you're there to support me!

If I continue development, I'll add things like high scores, online leaderboards, and whatever the community has to suggest. If you have any suggestions chuck a comment on my video and I'll pick a few to implement!

Just a quick note - If you are on Windows I would recommend downloading the browser version can sometimes take a long time to load depending on your internet.

Edit: Apparently the web version doesn't work for some reason, so I have removed it. Unfortunately this means that the game can only be played on Windows until I find someone with a Mac who is willing to let me build the game on their computer.
